definitions.definition: An existing criminal record (short for "previous convictions")
examples: It turned out the shoplifter had a lot of previous .

definitions.definition: A track record of similar behaviour, especially bad behaviour.
A record of previous hostility or conflict (between people).
examples: The two players refused to shake hands — there's a bit of previous there.

main_definition: ( informal , UK ) An existing criminal record (short for "previous convictions")
secondary_definitions: ( informal , UK ) A track record of similar behaviour, especially bad behaviour.
( informal , UK ) A record of previous hostility or conflict (between people).
